# ApiClient.InitializeApi method

Use this function to initialize Rewired if the Rewired Input Manager was not in the starting scene.

```csharp
public bool InitializeApi(ApiTypes api, int timeout = 30)
```

## Return Value

TRUE if Rewired was successfully initialized.

## Examples

```csharp
// Initialize the api for use with Rewired Input Manager.
api.InitializeApi(ApiTypes.REWIRED);
```
